info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:17PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DANIELS AND NORTHEASTERN VALLEY COUNTIES... At 815 PM MDT, a confirmed tornado was located near Peerless, or 21 miles east of Opheim, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Daniels County Dispatch called at 8:10 pm to confirm that a tornado has touched down 10 to 15 miles SW of Peerless. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. This tornado will be near... Richland and Peerless around 835 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include West Fork. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
